name: Sally's Lemonade
description:
• Sally's Lemonade is a cursed tale about a girl just wanting to share her lemonade with the good folks of the culdesac. As Sally's best friend, you must help her gather ingredients while things around you get a little ... strange. Sally's Lemonade was the result of streamer Moonmoon's 4th annual game jam, which took pace in January 2022. The jam ran for 72 hours. This version of the game has additional levels of polish, bug fixes, QOL updates and new features!

Main Features :

  • Make Lemonade!  - Help Sally gather exotic ingredients for her lemonade. Only the best will do for the neighbors!
  • Top-Notch Minigames! - Become immersed in flawlessly polished minigames while you make and sell lemonade!
  • Help Find Lost Pets! - Do your good deed for the day by helping to find lost dogs that have recently went missing in the culdesac!
  • Become the Perfect Best Friend! - Ascend to the status of #1 best friend and model citizen. You will be the talk of the town for sure!
  • Post-Process & Control Settings - Press (P) or (Esc) to pause the game and view the expansive gameplay options and settings!
  • Charlie the Cat! - Featuring in his first video game!

Project Details :

  • Unreal Engine 4.27
  • C++ & Blueprints
  • Dev Time : 72 Hours
  • Team Size :  4 ( 2 programmers, 1 3D/2D Artist, and 1 Audio Artist)
  • Programming Responsibilities (UI, Enemy AI, Game Modes & more) 
  • Design Responsibilities (Level &)

Tips & Tricks (Wow!):

  • Clicking "Easy Mode" in the pause menu will make the game easier.
  • After beating the game, the cheat code to skip to the end is revealed.
  • Dogs usually hide in their doghouses!
  • If they aren't in their houses, try using your BB-gun to scare the dogs out when you hear them growl nearby. Dogs like to disguise themselves as the weirdest things!

Please feel free to report any issues in the comment section below. 

Thanks for playing!
